column1: Streaming Platform User Engagement & Revenue Intelligence Dashboard
Strategic analysis of monetization, retention, and content performance drivers

column2: PREMIUM & STANDARD together drive majority of platform revenue.
column8: User retention remains evenly distributed across subscription plans, reflecting consistent stickiness.

column2: USA dominates revenue contribution, indicating heavy dependence on a single geographic market.
column8: Tablet and Desktop users demonstrate deeper engagement compared to Mobile users.

column2: Romance and Thriller genres show highest engagement, making them key content drivers.
column8: Inactive users show lower engagement and spending, confirming engagement as a key retention driver.

column2: Limited Series and Documentaries generate higher engagement, reflecting stronger long-form content retention.
column8: Spending and engagement levels are broadly similar across plans, suggesting stable monetization across tiers.
